contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 20, 1881 D Farnworth Contest
Farnworth Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
farnworth-contest
None
Cricket Ground, Farnworth Prizes - 1st £15 and cornet, 2nd £8 and trombone, 3rd £6, 4th £2. March contest - 1st(£1.5s.) Southport Volunteers, 2nd (10s.) Bradshaw. 13 bands entered, 11 (10) competed St Johns only competed in the quickstep contest
Dec. 19, 2012, 10:08 p.m. Aug. 11, 2019, 12:29 p.m.
